summary: A new home for your charachter to live in. Includes everything you need, smithing tools, a coocking spot, a pool and plenty of sotrage room (including working weapon racks, mannequins and a treasure room).
descriptionHtml:
[color=green][size=5][b]Description[/b][/size][/color]
[quote]
This mod adds a new home to the north-west of Skyrim. It\'s located neraby a beautiful little pond far enough away to not get disturbed by unwelcome strangers. The house itself is supposed to be a hideout and because of this it looks quite unspecatacular from the outside. It\'s interior on the other hand is full of luxury.
[/quote]

[color=green][size=5][b]Feautres[/b][/size][/color]
[quote]
Included are:
-A Mannequin
-Weapon racks
-Weapon plaques
-A treasure room
-A pool
-Smithing tools
-A cooking spot

(And a map marker, allowing fast travel)
[/quote]

[color=green][size=5][b]Installation[/b][/size][/color]
[quote]
Just place the .esp in your Data folder. Deinstallation is is simple aswell, just remove the .esp and you\'re done.
[/quote]

[color=green][size=5][b]Misc stuff :)[/b][/size][/color]
[quote]
The .esp is currently in german, I would appreciate it if someone could make a english version. It shouldn\'t be a problem to use the german version for now, as it doesn\'t change any conversation info or anything else that might cause problems with your game.
[/quote]
And leave a comment if you have found a bug or have some suggestions.

If you like the file, then track it as future updates will come for sure :)

[size=2]This is my first \'real\' CK mod, so go easy on me :D[/size]

(Graphics mod used in the screenshots: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9813][b]Link[/b][/url])
author: tristan1974
